desc: Sorbents are used to clean up oil and chemical spills and come in a variety of forms; powders, pads, pillows, booms, etc. Earthwise Sorbents, has developed a new line of highly effective sorbent products, made in the USA from recycled and repurposed foam (polyurethane) and fabric (polypropylene) materials.

layout.text: BORN FROM THE OCEAN TO PROTECT THE PLANET
Earthwise merges science and nature, revolutionizing oil and chemical spill management.
